General.Name: Univanich Palm Oil Public Company Limited
General.Description: Univanich Palm Oil Public Company Limited engages in oil palm plantations, crushing mills, and oil palm research and seed businesses in Thailand. The company processes crude palm oil and palm kernel oil. It also operates electric power plant with methane capture biogas project. The company also exports its products. Univanich Palm Oil Public Company Limited was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Krabi, Thailand.

2.Name: Dr. Palat  Tittinutchanon
2.Title: Head of Oil Palm Research & Exec. Director
